Module cyfight
Package fr.cyu.cyfight.event.base

Class EventDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cyu.cyfight.event.base.EventDispatcher
  • public class EventDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    The EventDispatcher class is the central class managing all game events. It centralizes event managers that are responsible for emitting events to any object that subscribes to a specific event. Then it can be called by any event emitter in order to send the event to all objects listening.

    An EventManager needs to register itself on the EventDispatcher in order to emit events.

    Author:
    Mika INISAN
    See Also:
    EventManager, EventListener

      private boolean lockEvents
      Lock events (when event are locked, the EventDispatcher does not raise any event)

        Returns:

      • register

        public EventDispatcher register​(EventManager eventManager)
        Registers an EventManager so that his events can be dispatched. Should be called when initializing the application.
        Parameters:
        eventManager - an event manager
        Returns:
        the instance of the EventDispatcher

      • lockEvents

        public void lockEvents​(boolean lock)
        Lock events.
        Parameters:
        lock - true to disable all events

      • subscribe

        public EventDispatcher subscribe​(java.lang.reflect.Type eventType,
                                 EventListener eventListener)
        Subscribes an object so that it can listen to a specific event.
        Parameters:
        eventType - type of the event to subscribe to
        eventListener - object that wants to listen to the event
        Returns:
        the instance of the EventDispatcher

      • unsubscribe

        public EventDispatcher unsubscribe​(java.lang.reflect.Type eventType,
                                   EventListener eventListener)
        Unsubscribes an object so that it stops listening to an event.
        Parameters:
        eventType - type of the event to unsubscribe to
        eventListener - object that wants to listen to the event
        Returns:
        the instance of the EventDispatcher

      • dispatchEvent

        public void dispatchEvent​(java.lang.Object sender,
                          java.lang.reflect.Type eventType,
                          EventArgs eventArgs)
        Sends an event to all objects listening to it.
        Parameters:
        sender - the object that is sending the event
        eventType - type of the event
        eventArgs - information that is required by the event to send information to listeners

        private EventDispatcher raiseEventManagerNotFound​(java.lang.reflect.Type eventType)
        Displays an error when no event manager has been found to manage a specific event.
        Parameters:
        eventType - the type of the event
        Returns:
        the instance of the EventDispatcher
